Section.name: About Smt Velagapudi Durgamba Siddhartha Law College
Section.description:
Smt Velagapudi Durgamba Siddhartha Law College, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh was established in the year 1987. Right after its establishment, the Bar Council of India recognized the college as the ‘model law college’ in the state. The college is affiliated to the prestigious Acharya Nagarjuna University. It has also been granted permanent recognition by the Government of Andhra Pradesh and the BCI. The college provides both three and five-year LLB programs. It is situated on a campus spread over 11 acres of land and strives to provide an academic ambience to its students along with the scope to relax after a hectic day of work.
